original_text:
they poured out innocent blood,
    the blood of their sons and daughters,
whom they sacrificed to the idols of Canaan,
    and the land was polluted with blood.
korean_text: 무죄한 피 곧 그들의 자녀의 피를 흘려 가나안의 우상들에게 제사하므로 그 땅이 피로 더러워졌도다

sentences.original_text: the blood of their sons and daughters
whom they sacrificed to the idols of Canaan
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 가나안의 우상에게 제물로 바친 것들

sentences.original_text: and the land was polluted with blood
